ending_theme: #1: "Gradus Vita" by Hayato Matsuo, performed by the Warsaw Philharmonic Orchestra (eps 1, 10)
#2: "Merche Funebre" by Hayato Matsuo, performed by the Warsaw Philharmonic Orchestra (ep 2)
#5: "A Patriot with No Name" By Hayato Matsuo and the Warsaw Philharmonic Orchestra (ep 5)
#8: "P.S. Lord Amitabha Have Mercy on Me" & "When You Start the War, Fight With Arrows, Spears and Swords!" by Yasushi Ishii (ep 8)
